data.what_is:
Delivra is an email marketing platform helping marketers of any expertise captivate and grow their audience. With more than 20 years of unrivaled customer success, Delivra helps businesses engage in meaningful conversations that produce tangible results. Their focus on approachable solutions has helped empower thousands of organizations across industries to take control of complex marketing automation and data handling. Delivra scales with you and provides the tools you need to succeed every step of the way.

Built for busy marketers, Delivra offers a full suite of features to help teams reach their goals. Easily build and send impactful email marketing campaigns with a customizable drag and drop editor. Automate your customer communications by strategically plotting an entire email series, determining which mailings are sent based on a variety of subscriber actions, inactions or time. Get more engagement from your audience and reach customers outside of their inbox with expert segmentation and SMS marketing. 

Whether you're working B2B, promoting a Non-Profit, or planning an event, Delivra provides robust analytics and ongoing support to encourage users to hone in and refine their strategy. Integrate with a wide variety of CRM's, e-commerce platforms, and web analytics tools so everything you need is available in one place. The software either plugs right into the current tech, or Delivra builds out a custom integration to ensure that everything works smoothly.
data.product_description: Digital marketing solution for email marketing, mobile, social and consulting.Delivra's unique market approach is tailored to small and medium-sized businesses given the company's combination of powerful software and unrivaled customer support. Ideal for companies with 0-5 marketers, Delivra provides its customers expert guidance in strategic campaign consulting, email design, content strategy and more to ensure meaningful customer conversations and tangible results. Every Delivra client has a dedicated account manager to give answers, guide users through the email marketing process, or provide hands-on service to keep the conversations happening.The idea of giving clients a helping hand while navigating email marketing hasn't changed since Delivra opened its doors more than 15 years ago. The core of Delivra's mission is helping clients build email marketing campaigns that get noticed, get conversations going with recipients, and actually get results. With a 90 percent client retention rate over the last four years, it's obvious Delivra is the answer to modern marketers' needs.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Custom Tracking Domain
features.content: Ability to define a custom domain from which emails are sent.

features.name: Multiple Domains
features.content: Able to send emails from multiple domains.

features.name: Dedicated IPView full feature definition
features.content: Ability to use a dedicated IP for deliverability.

features.name: Documentation
features.content: Availability and quality of documentation for API, code library, implementation, and set up.

features.name: Sender Reputation Management
features.content: Ability for the platform to manage individual domain reputations. That way, senders with good sending practices are not penalized based on the sending practices of others.

features.name: Tracking & Reporting
features.content: Tracks emails sent and delivery rates and compiles them into standard reports.

features.name: Enterprise Scalability

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Emails are consistently received and software performs reliably.

initial_reviews.review_title: A Solid ESP for Automation and Emails
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
It's a solid tool that can send emails using automation and other single campaigns.

You can easily utilize dynamic features which makes personalization great.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
The tool is a bit bulky and the integrations don't always work seamlessly.

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
We send a lot of emails to different users based on different stages of the funnel Delivra allows us to send emails using their automation.

initial_reviews.review_title: Horribly outdated & clunky ESP
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
They have a quasi-attentive Customer Support team that leans in when needed to help troubleshoot issues.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
The fact that I've had to leverage their Customer Support team as much as I have.

The company was sold off after we signed contract, the overall product seemed to take a back-seat. There were very few ugrades to the platform over the 2+ years we were with them. Designing in their tool was incredibly cumbersome, and testing email sends sometimes took days to iron out "quirks" in their code, etc... The team spent too much time building, testing and sending simple emails. The back-end was not user-friendly and required quite a bit of training - totally different than other more modern ESP's.

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Honestly, none.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent Customer Service, and fantastic training library.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
Customer service. They are very helpful and make my job easier. They constantly make improvements which make the product even better. Most of the time it is user error, but they are always kind and ready to solve the issues. List segmentation is very easy to use, drip campaigns are easy to navigate as well. Delivra has an excellent training/learning library.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
I don't believe they have a good integration with surveys but I could be wrong. Also, using this on mobile isn't great. I hope that will be an upgrade in the future!  Since they have merged/were bought out a few times, it is harder to get information from them when an issue comes up, especially with billing.

Recommendations to others considering Delivra:
It is worth serious consideration. Pricing alone make this an easy sell, but pricing is not why we have stayed. (see other reasons listed)

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
The reports are easy to navigate, and is easy to use for seasoned digital people as well as beginners.

Delivra offers a huge choice of professional looking templates to choose from.  Their customer service people are always polite and knowledgeable.  They are very helpful when setting up a new account, migrating your data, and creating custom templates.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
Their software has gone through too many major updates over the last couple of years. It can be frustrating to have to learn "new" software over and over again.

Recommendations to others considering Delivra:
I recommend Delivra to any person or company in the beginning stages of using email campaigns to sell products or grow a business.  It's not too complicated, tracks results, looks professional, and the customer service reps are always happy to help.

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've been able to use Delivra weekly to communicate with our congregation and visitors, but have also begun to run fundraising campaigns through Delivra as well.  This was especially challenging because the recipient lists needed to include some of our contacts, while excluding others.  Delivra CSR's helped us to set up very specific lists, run tests, and feel at ease because we were sure about the delivery results.

all_reviews.review_title: Some old/clunky elements, but lots of flexibility
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
They are still one of the last remaining email providers that has contracts for numbers of email sent, rather than the number in your database.  We have very large list of clients, but highly segmented.  Many of the clients only request communication a couple of times a year.  If we were charged by number of clients, and not number of emails sent, it would be much more expensive for us.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
Some elements, like their email template builder, are a bit dated.  However - it does offer good flexibility especially if you know some rudimentary html code.

Recommendations to others considering Delivra:
Check out the type of contract- how they charge you.  The software is only part of the equation.  Delivra had a leg up on the comp for our business needs.

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Communication with clients was at success rates similar to other email providers - not a huge spam problem.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
I love the drag and drop editor. It makes building the basic parts super easy. We haven't started using the sharing or social media links but they look very nice at the bottom of the emails. If we had a designer on staff we would probably build our own templates but since we don't the drag and drop is perfect for us. All of the reporting that is available is super helpful. My favorite report is the click through heat map, it shows you how many clicks are made and it appears all in a snapshot of the email itself, so you can see what parts hit the most in terms of location inside the email.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
Sometimes the editor can get a little weird when it comes to the buttons and padding. I know that some email providers don't render the code correctly and it can look a little different from what you see in the editor, but I've had consistent issues with placing certain types of buttons at the top of the email. You just have to make sure to test on multiple platforms before sending, but we do that anyway just like any other email.

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
We send out a newsletter that is geared toward reducing call and chat support volume for a software company. The reporting that is available has really helped us prove that this newsletter is working and actually driving volume down through proactive and educational content. We've used a few reports recently to present our newsletter to other departments and they were very impressed by the power of Delivra! We also use Delivra through an API in our software so that our clients can use the same powerful email delivery and reporting that they have to offer but still within our application.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
As a government affairs and association management firm, the feature that immediately got out attention is the ability to have sub-accounts. We send out an average of 10 emails per week between our associations and events and Delivera has made it easy to break it down and ensure our emails are getting to the right people.

Coming from Constant Contact, Delivera had far more features that allowed our members to easily read our emails and access the info they needed quickly with button features, etc.

On the backend, it was amazing to see the breakdown of our email stats - right down to how many times one person forwarded our email. Very details results which help us adjust to our users.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
While Delivera has amazing features - you must have the time to figure everything out.

I highly recommend dedicating one person to sending emails and giving them at least a week of figuring out all the capabilities and setup. I've been using the account for almost 5 months and still don't think I am maximizing my services, just don't have the time yet.

Recommendations to others considering Delivra:
It is worth the switch, even if it is a little extra money. Our read rates and click rates and gone up significantly!

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before, we had issues with emails displaying the same across all user platforms - including mobile. With Deliveras features, like mobile view and litmus testing, we are able to adjust and be sure to nix the problem before it even starts.

We also use the SMS feature which is super helpful for public events, like our restaurant weeks. Subscribers are able to get info first hand and all we have to do is send a simple text!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
I love the easy to understand Mailing Overviews.  It's all the information that my coworkers and I need see and it's right at our finger tips.  I am also a HUGE fan of the Clickthrough HeatMap.  If you haven't looked at this, you definitely need to.  It's visual representation of the number of clicks on each link in a specific mailing.  It has helped us learn where to place important content in our emails and what links are most valuable to our recipients.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
I've been using Delivra for a number of years and it used to look so outdated and it was hard to find things.  I had to keep notes on workflows because I couldn't remember where things were located.  Now that they've been making updates over the last year or two, it's gotten a lot better.  It's easier to navigate and find what I need.  Keep up the awesome improvements!

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
The team at Delivra helped us set up a monthly educational newsletter for our users and I couldn't have done it without them! They set up our account, taught me how to import our lists each month, create templates, and schedule the mailings. They also help us troubleshoot issues we run into with recipients not receiving our emails.  It's refreshing working with a company that has a great product and a great team of people!

all_reviews.review_title: Unbelievable number of new features makes Delivra incredibly useful
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
In just the last year or so, the entire product has been redesigned and not just visually.  The entire process for creating an email has been made easier and compares very well to mass market email software's like MailChimp while continuing to provide advanced segmenting options.  The drag and drop editor, naturally mobile friendly design templates, and improvements across the board to lesser seen email marketing tools like signup form builder are pronounced and incredibly helpful.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
Some of the help documents are still in the middle of being updated and it would be helpful to see this continue to be touched up as some of the information in outdated.  I would love to see even more integrations built out so Delivra works 'out of the box' with some of the WordPress plugins I use at my agency.

Recommendations to others considering Delivra:
If your company is looking to grow their digital marketing efforts, email is a good place to look.  Delivra provides help around service, deliverability, and even content so they can be beneficial if you don't have a bunch of marketers on staff.  If you are a one man shop, you may want to stick with MailChimp until you start growing.  However at some point you will outgrow it as your marketing efforts come to fruition.  Once you have 5 marketers of so, you may also outgrow Delivra.  Not necessarily but if you are extremely focused on marketing automation, you may want to look upstream at something like Marketo, ET or Eloqua.

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email marketing is a tremendous lead generator when done well.  I create email marketing campaigns for B2B companies working to generate more revenue and Delivra has been a crucial part of that.  While I have used many other email marketing softwares and marketing automation suites, Delivra provides an outstanding software for a middle range cost and is easy to use for me and the midmarket companies (mostly defined by the number of marketers they have, not the revenue they bring in) I work with most often.

all_reviews.review_title: A great marketing tool and a strong team to back it up
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
I really appreciate the customer service at Delivra. They are so responsive to all of my questions and always easy to reach. They are also open to suggestions for improvements and are continually upgrading their product.. The deliverability rate and reporting tools are superior to what i have found on other platforms.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
Their site can be slow at times. i hope they can make some changes to speed it up so we can complete our work faster.

Recommendations to others considering Delivra:
Delivra is a great tool for the more advanced email marketer. I think that if you are a very basic user that is looking for a very easy platform, then you might benefit from another tool. Delivra has advanced reporting but their design tools are a little tougher to use. They are constantly improving them though. The customer service is the best I have seen of any tool we have used.

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are learning to work more efficiently which allows us to send more mailings that are personalized to the recipients. We are improving our tracking so we can more accurately attribute what content is driving readers to click and complete a conversion.

all_reviews.review_title: Comprehensive solution for all of our email marketing needs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
Delivra allows easy yet strategic access to all of my contacts in a comprehensive and meaningful way. The drip campaigns allow me to target prospects personally and record valuable metrics for my marketing team. The support staff from Delivra is top-notch, I'm not sure if I have had a better experience with customer care anywhere else. The staff is always incredibly friendly, patient and incredibly knowledgeable. I'm always floored at how quickly they answer my questions, then offer solutions to better my experience.

We are excited to use drip campaigns that will allows us to see who is active in our lists and who isn't, allowing us to clean out our contacts and make more meaningful connections.


What do you dislike about Delivra?
Not being able to text wrap when creating an email can be a pain. The drag and drop editor is great, however I am always trying to manage the length of my content around the size of an image. There are also a few issues with trying to manage our segments that can prove to be confusing. If there was an easier way to see a total picture of our contacts, how many are in each segment and how to manage those, that would make my life easier.

Recommendations to others considering Delivra:
I would definitely give it a try! Lot's of features that can revolutionize the way you see your email marketing campaigns.

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use this to send our monthly email blasts as well as invitations for upcoming events.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
Coming from Constant Contact, I like Delivra because it is SO user-friendly. It allows me to rearrange and format my email with ease and looks phenomenal. The pre-designed templates are also handy if an email needs to go out quickly, when I don't necessarily have time to create my own layout. One of my absolute favorite things about Delivra is the interaction I have received from employees. They took the time to contact me, walk me through the software, follow-up after our first email and let me know that they were always available for any questions I may have.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
With only starting out with Delivra less than a month ago, I haven't run in to too many problems yet. The only thing I noticed while putting together my company's email was that when formatting certain aspects of the message (contact/social media buttons), I couldn't get them exactly the way I wanted them on both the Desktop and Mobile display.

DO IT! Great customer support and a great software for any business.

We have completely revamped our customer email lists and imported them into the Delivra system. This was very beneficial because we are finally reaching our CURRENT customers and can easily update those lists each month when we add or lose customers.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Delivra?
The drag-and-drop feature makes it easy for non-technical people like me to use.    The mailing list and port is fairly simple, and I absolutely, absolutely, absolutely love the reporting feature where we can see the click through's and target a second mailing two classes of recipients.

What do you dislike about Delivra?
The program runs extremely slow, all the time. I verified it is not just my Internet speed, because other programs in the office or working fine while I'm working on Delivera. It takes forever to send out a brief mailing because of the load speed of Delivra's website

I would also appreciate an auto save feature. Some key combination that I'm not aware of or click somewhere on the screen deletes my entire work and goes back to a blank template. Given there is no back button or undue, this is been very frustrating several times. I know I can manually save throughout the process, but in today's world where all of the Other programs I use have autosave, it is very frustrating to lose a ton of work and have no way to recapture it.

Also, despite being told several times that the bullet feature is fixed, it is still not fixed.

What problems is Delivra solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have no way to be in front of our clients periodically without a face-to-face touch, which can get impossible when your clients number in the hundreds or thousands. Delivera gives me a simple way to reach out to them. I don't utilize it as often as I could, because of the slow load times as I'm working through a mailing, but it definitely has kept our name in front of prospects and  changed cold calling to warm calling.
